name: Coco Run (PedroFG)
description:
CocoRun is an arcade endless runner that we made for a JAM in three days when we only had been coding for three months.

This is a version I made in a weekend for fun to change some things. You can find the original project we made here https://guillermo-barrasa.itch.io/coco-run .

The game was made by a group of two programmers and two artists.

Programmers: Guillermo Barrasa and Pedro Fernandez.

Artists: Marc Batlle and Oriol Jaumot

Controls:

  • Enter/ Space to select
  • Arrows to move in menu
  • Up arrow: Jump (It can double jump)
  • Right arrow: Dash
